from mqtt import *
from event_manager import *
import time
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1

event_manager.reset()

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__nutnhan1_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):

  if th_C3_B4ng_tin:
    display.set_all('#00ff00')
  else:
    display.set_all('#ff0000')

def on_event_timer_callback_H_A_Q_p_t():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin
  mqtt.on_receive_message('nutnhan1', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__nutnhan1_)

event_manager.add_timer_event(3000, on_event_timer_callback_H_A_Q_p_t)

if True:
  mqtt.connect_wifi('', '')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='io.adafruit.com', port=1883, username='HauNg', password='aio_GFpb34Vx9muBcclCNV8aqqSMt4j9')

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  mqtt.check_message()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
